content: Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk BIG WINS Race will work like this:Prize Pool5000 USDTPrizes1st place - 1500 USDT2nd place - 1000 USDT3rd place - 500 UDT4th place - 250 USDT5th place - 250 USDT6th to 10th place  - 200 USDT11th to 15th place - 100 USDTHow?Reply to this post with a screenshot of your BIGGEST WIN on any Live Game at livecasino.io Send us a PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BIG WINS Race as PM subject to facilitate the management) Promo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Tuesday 31st May 23:59 GMTRulesOnly wins made during campaign period are eligibleAll wins values will be validated by livecasino.io teamThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Friday 3rd June , 17:00 GMT Normal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyLet the games begin...Flávio from livecasino.io team

We will count only your higher value.Quote from: PaulBf1 on May 26, 2022, 06:29:59 PMCan newbies participate in this? Because of the pm thing Can newbies participate in this?Yes.
